lead_paragraph: Under the agreement, the park corporation will have to hold public hearings if it wants to change its building plans.

headline.print_headline: Housing Lawsuit Is Settled by Brooklyn Bridge Park
headline.main: Brooklyn Bridge Park Settles Housing Lawsuit

snippet: Under the agreement, the park corporation will have to hold public hearings if it wants to change its building plans.
abstract: Brooklyn Bridge Park Corp settles lawsuit brought by community group People for Green Space Foundation, allowing officials to move forward with development plan; plaintiffs are denied desired environmental review, but corporation will have to formally amend plan to include changes to affordable housing.
